create_filename - construct custom filename for downloads in EJAM app

Source: R/create_filename.R
create_filename.Rd

Builds filename from file description, analysis title, buffer distance, and site selection method. Values are pulled from Shiny app if used there.

Usage

create_filename(
  file_desc = "",
  title = "",
  buffer_dist = 0,
  site_method = "",
  with_datetime = TRUE,
  ext = NULL
)

Arguments

file_desc

file description, such as "short report", "long report", "results_table"

title

analysis title

buffer_dist

buffer distance

site_method

site selection method, such as NAICS, FRS, SHP, latlon

with_datetime

boolean to include date and time

ext

optional file extension. will check for '.' and add if not provided

Value

Returns string of pasted filename with specified components

Examples

# specify all arguments
create_filename(file_desc = 'results_table', title = 'My Title', buffer_dist = 1, site_method = 'NAICS', with_datetime=TRUE, ext = '.xlsx')
#> Error in create_filename(file_desc = "results_table", title = "My Title",     buffer_dist = 1, site_method = "NAICS", with_datetime = TRUE,     ext = ".xlsx"): could not find function "create_filename"
# specify title only
create_filename(title = 'Summary of Analysis')
#> Error in create_filename(title = "Summary of Analysis"): could not find function "create_filename"
